name: Edenor, S.A.
description: Edenor, S.A. is a leading electric utility company based in Argentina, primarily engaged in the distribution and commercialization of electricity. Founded in 1992, Edenor serves approximately 3 million customers in the northern region of Greater Buenos Aires, making it the largest electricity distributor in Argentina. The company operates under a regulatory framework established by the Argentine government, ensuring the provision of reliable and efficient electricity services to both residential and commercial clients. Edenor is committed to enhancing the quality of its services and investing in infrastructure improvements to meet the growing demand for electricity in the region. The company has undertaken various initiatives aimed at promoting sustainability and energy efficiency, including the development of smart grid technologies and the promotion of renewable energy sources. With a focus on customer satisfaction and operational excellence, Edenor continues to adapt to the evolving energy landscape while maintaining a strong commitment to corporate social responsibility. The company’s mission is to deliver high-quality energy services while contributing to the sustainable development of the communities it serves.

seo.meta_title: Edenor, S.A. | Leading Electricity Distributor in Argentina
seo.meta_description: Edenor, S.A. is Argentina's largest electricity distributor, serving millions of customers with a commitment to sustainability and service excellence.

faq.question: What services does Edenor provide?
faq.answer: Edenor provides electricity distribution and commercialization services to residential and commercial customers.

faq.question: Where is Edenor headquartered?
faq.answer: Edenor is headquartered in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Edenor?
faq.answer: Jorge L. P. R. Rodriguez is the CEO of Edenor, S.A.
